description: This Java abstract class 'EventCodeProducer' serves as a base for generating code for Java and Native Events within the 'com.icontrol.generate.service.io' package. It manages dependencies, enums, and event-related wrappers for code generation, indicating its role in a code generation framework.

classes.name: EventCodeProducer
classes.description: An abstract base class for generating Java and Native event code, managing dependencies and enums relevant to event generation.

methods.name: getEnumsToGenerate
methods.description: Returns a list of EnumDefWrapper objects representing enums that should be generated as part of the event code, filtering those relevant to the event section.

methods.name: getEventDependencies
methods.description: Provides an iterator over wrappers that are dependencies of the event, filtered by whether native/native code or Java code is being generated.

methods.name: scanWrappersForDependencies
methods.description: Helper method to scan through wrappers and add those that are relevant (belong to the event section and match the language mask) to the dependency list.
